DOC.brief_title: Electrical Stimulation Pain Therapy Treating Chronic Pain Numbness Caused By Chemotherapy Patients With Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . To evaluate effect MC5-A pain symptom immediately time . II . To evaluate effect Calmare therapy non-pain symptom . III . To evaluate effect MC5-A daily opioid pain medication use . OUTLINE : Patients undergo electric stimulation pain therapy comprise MC5-A Calmare therapy 30 minute daily 10 day . After completion study treatment , patient follow 3 month .
